de.tub.data.dao
Interface IHGClusterDAO<E>

All Superinterfaces:
IDao
All Known Implementing Classes:
Neo4JHGClusterDAO
public interface IHGClusterDAO<E>
extends IDao

This interface provides methods to access Framework cluster. The IFrameworkClusterDAO is part of the Data Access Object design pattern.

Author:
Sebastian Oelke

Method Summary
 void addChildHGCluster(E parent, E child)
          Connects the given child cluster with the parent cluster.
 void addStayPoint(E parent, E stayPoint, Map<String,Object> params)
          Connects the given Stay Point with the given cluster.
 E createHGCluster(Object id, Object userId)
          Creates a cluster as well as an entry in the cluster index for the user with the given id and saves it.
 void deleteHGCluster(Object id, Object userId)
          Deletes the cluster with the given id.
 E findHGClusterById(Object id, Object userId)
          Finds a cluster of a user by means of its identifier.
 

Method Detail

createHGCluster

E createHGCluster(Object id,
                  Object userId)
Creates a cluster as well as an entry in the cluster index for the user with the given id and saves it.

Parameters:
id - the identifier of this cluster.
userId - the identifier of the user.
Returns:
the created node or null if the node could not be created.

deleteHGCluster

void deleteHGCluster(Object id,
                     Object userId)
Deletes the cluster with the given id.

Parameters:
id - the identifier of the cluster to delete.
userId - the identifier of the user to delete the cluster from.

findHGClusterById

E findHGClusterById(Object id,
                    Object userId)
Finds a cluster of a user by means of its identifier.

Parameters:
id - the identifier of the cluster to find.
userId - the id of the user to find the cluster for.
Returns:
the cluster with the given identifier or null if no cluster was found.

addStayPoint

void addStayPoint(E parent,
                  E stayPoint,
                  Map<String,Object> params)
Connects the given Stay Point with the given cluster.

Parameters:
parent - the parent to which to connect the Stay Point to.
stayPoint - the Stay Point to connect with.
params - the parameters/properties to add to the connection. The implementation defines if null values are allowed. A null Map should indicate that no properties should be added to the connection.

addChildHGCluster

void addChildHGCluster(E parent,
                       E child)
Connects the given child cluster with the parent cluster.

Parameters:
parent - the parent to which to connect the child to.
child - the child cluster to connect with.
